content.text: Building Regulations shall be as follows:
Height: No dwelling or other building or structure shall exceed 2.5 stories or 25 feet in height, whichever is less
Plot Area: No dwelling or other building shall be constructed on a lot containing less than 13,000 square feet.
Minimum First Floor Area: 1800 square feet
Maximum ratio of building area floor area to lot area
Lot Area(square feet): less than 14,520  FAR: 0.42
Lot Area(square feet): between 14,520 & 21,780  FAR: 0.42 for first 14,520 square feet, additional FAR of 0.13 permitted for lot area in excess of 14,520, but not more than 21,780
Lot Area(square feet): between 21,780 & 32,670  FAR: based on calculation for first 21,780 square feet, additional FAR of 0.10 permitted for lot area in excess of 21,780, but not more than 32,670
Lot Area(square feet): between 32,670 & 43,560  FAR: based on calculation for first 32,670 square feet, additional FAR of 0.06 permitted for lot area in excess of 32,670, but not more than 43,560
Lot Area(square feet): greater than 43,560  FAR: based on calculation for first 43,560 square feet, additional FAR of 0.03 permitted for lot area in excess of 43,560
Rear Yard: There shall be a rear yard, the depth of which shall not be less than 30 feet.
Side Yards: All lots shall have two side yards, the depths of which shall not be less than 17.5 feet.
Front Yard: There shall be a front yard, the depth of which shall not be less than 45 feet.
Minimum Street Frontage: No building or structre shall be constructed on any lot in the Village of Saddle Rock which has a frontage of less than 75 feet.
Accessory Regulations shall be as follows:
No accessory structre shall be erected or maintained within 17.5 of a side property line.

Accessory buildings and/or stuctures, except as otherwise provided in this chapter, shall not be over 15 feet in height, as measured from their highest point, and shall not occupy more than 40% of the area of the rear yard.
No accessory builing or structre shall be erected within 25 feet of a building used for residence purposes on an adjoining lot.
